title:
Comparing and replacing files based on the Git history [[comparereplace_compare"> === Comparing files
Eclipse Git compare files
Eclipse Git allows you to compare a selected file, folder or project with another commit or with the Git index. Use menu:Team[Compare with] to open the menu. Afterwards select with what you want to compare. The _HEAD Revision_ selection is depicted in the following screenshot.
image::egit_compare10.png[Compare,pdfwidth=60%]
[[comparereplace_replace"> === Replacing files
Eclipse Git replace files
The menu:Team[Replace with] menu entry allows you to replace the current selection with the version contained in the selected commit or the Git index.
image::egit_replacewith10.png[Compare,pdfwidth=60%]
